DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety of pregabalin in patients with fibromyalgia.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Of Pregabalin In Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet the ACR criteria for fibromyalgia (ie, widespread pain present for at least 3 months, and pain in at least 11 of 18 specific tender point sites. Patients must complete the doubleblind study. Patients who experienced a serious adverse event during the previous fibromyalgia study, which was determined to be related to the study medication.
